title: Name SkiaSharp.View.Desktop does not exist in Winform project
body:
Error CS0234: The type or namespace name 'View' does not exist in the namespace 'SkiaSharp' (are you missing an assembly reference?)

I was able to compile a SkiaSharp project until this line was added in SharpDevelop 4.4 or Visual Studio 2017 Community Release.

using SkiaSharp.View.Desktop;

Development machine is a Windows 10 and build target set to x86, Net 4.5.  

Is this a bug?

comments.author: mattleibow
comments.body:
This is because you need to add the package:

https://www.nuget.org/packages/SkiaSharp.Views/

This package adds the various views, the other one is just the engine.

comments.author: chihkeong
comments.body:
Hi,

Me bad, in the project, I added the reference to the Skiasharp.View dynamic link library to the project and the namespace errors are gone.  

This is an excellent implementation, will be moving all my GDI drawing routines to Skiasharp!

Thank you.
